_comment: exploring.fyi Application Settings - Controls AI generation, mindmap layout, and UI behavior
_max-mindmap-nodes_comment: Maximum number of concept nodes generated around main topic in mindmap. Used in: MindMap.svelte createPlaceholderNodes(), affects initial topic analysis and visual layout complexity
_max-chapters-generated_comment: Maximum chapters generated when creating Table of Contents for a topic. Used in: generate-toc APIs, tocGeneration.ts, affects learning content depth and generation time
_max-paragraphs-generated_comment: Maximum paragraphs per chapter in ToC structure. Used in: ToC generation prompts and validation, affects content granularity within chapters
_max-words-per-paragraph_comment: Target word count for each generated paragraph. Used in: generate-paragraph API, paragraph generation prompts, affects content depth per section
_ai-model-temperature_comment: AI creativity/randomness (0.0=deterministic, 1.0=creative). Used in: all Genkit AI generate() calls across APIs, affects content variation and consistency
_ai-max-output-tokens_comment: Maximum tokens AI can generate per request. Used in: all Genkit AI configurations, prevents truncation and controls response length
_mindmap-node-radius_comment: Distance from parent node when placing child nodes in mindmap. Used in: MindMap.svelte createPlaceholderNodes(), affects visual spacing and layout
_mindmap-node-width_comment: Width of mindmap nodes for collision detection and spacing calculations. Used in: topicAnalysis.ts calculateSafeRadius(), prevents node overlaps
_mindmap-base-radius_comment: Base radius for initial topic breakdown node positioning. Used in: topicAnalysis.ts createMindMapFromBreakdown(), affects overall mindmap size
_mindmap-min-radius_comment: Minimum radius for node positioning to ensure readability. Used in: topicAnalysis.ts calculateSafeRadius(), prevents nodes from being too close to center
_mindmap-max-radius_comment: Maximum radius for node positioning to keep mindmap compact. Used in: topicAnalysis.ts calculateSafeRadius(), prevents mindmap from becoming too large
_default-difficulty_comment: Default learning difficulty level (beginner/intermediate/advanced). Used in: AI generation prompts, affects content complexity and language used
_default-language_comment: Default content language code. Used in: topic analysis and content generation when no language specified, affects prompt localization
_api-timeout-ms_comment: API request timeout in milliseconds. Used in: test files and potentially fetch configurations, prevents hanging requests
_pagination-limit_comment: Default number of items per page in lists. Used in: database queries in topics.ts, mindMaps.ts, affects query performance and UI pagination
_search-result-limit_comment: Maximum search results returned. Used in: search functions in database services, affects search performance and result relevance
_recent-topics-limit_comment: Maximum recent topics shown in history. Used in: topics.ts getRecentTopics(), affects history page performance and storage
